ValidationRule.description: Basic info requirements from Sales management for Accounts in the system.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
Owner.IsActive = false && ISBLANK( Description ),
ISBLANK ( NumberOfEmployees ),
ISBLANK ( BillingCountry ),
ISPICKVAL( Industry ,'Other')
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Minimum Account info not complete. Check: Account Owner is current user, Description, Employees, Billing Country and Industry is not equal to 'Other'. Try again!
